name: Ext_R4B_CareTeam_pa_role
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.CareTeam.participant.role for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents CareTeam.participant.role from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CareTeam|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Indicates specific responsibility of an individual within the care team, such as "Primary care physician", "Trained social worker counselor", "Caregiver", etc.
element.comment: `CareTeam.participant.role` maps to R5 `CareTeam.participant.role`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Indicates specific responsibility of an individual within the care team, such as "Primary care physician", "Trained social worker counselor", "Caregiver", etc.
element.comment: `CareTeam.participant.role` maps to R5 `CareTeam.participant.role`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Indicates specific responsibility of an individual within the care team, such as "Primary physician", "Team coordinator", "Caregiver", etc.
